text:
Westerwolde, Low Saxon: "Westerwoolde", is a municipality of the Province of Groningen, the Netherlands. It lies in the southeast of Groningen.
The municipality was established on January 1, 2018. It was made by combining the former municipalities of Bellingwedde and Vlagtwedde.
About 25,000 people live in Westerwolde. It covers an area of about.
The main settlement is Sellingen.
